    • Uses of AppMessage in TeamOrange.instantmessenger

      Methods in TeamOrange.instantmessenger with parameters of type AppMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void App.messageListener(AppMessage message)
      This function is called by BabblerBase when there is a new message event If the message type is NORMAL, then it is handled accordingly Otherwise if the message type is CHAT, then it is passed to the chatController, along with a variable representing if the current screen is the chat screen.
      void App.notifyContact(AppMessage message)
      Set notification for contacts

    • Uses of AppMessage in TeamOrange.instantmessenger.controllers

      Methods in TeamOrange.instantmessenger.controllers with parameters of type AppMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ChatController.incomingChatMessage(AppMessage message, boolean currentScreenIsChatScreen)
      Called when there is an incoming chat session message Retrieves the relevant chat if it exists, or creates one if the relevant user is a contact passes the message to the relevant chat to handle if the relevant chat session is the current chat session, and teh current screen is the chat scren, then the chatscreen re loads

      void AppChats.handleMessage(AppMessage message)
